referral_program_invite_annotation.title: Invite friends and earn up to ${{sum}}
referral_program_invite_annotation.desc_line:
Got friends you think will enjoy homeis? 
Here's your chance to help them while earning some cash!

referral_explanation.title: How does it work?
referral_explanation.description:
Every homeis user has their own unique referral link. This link will be attached to every invitation you send via whatsapp, facebook, email, cellular message, or copy link.

For every user who registers from your link, you will earn ${{sumPerUser}} for use on Amazon. 

You may also withdraw your earned money after 5 users join homeis through your link.
